channel.title: How to write a new point line in character.text

item.title: How to write a new point line in character.text
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

			/* CHARACTER */
			characterfile.write("character-reborn = ", 0, 19);
			characterfile.write(Integer.toString(reborn), 0, Integer
					.toString(reborn).length());
			characterfile.newLine();

there.

and search for this:

					} else if (token.equals("character-height")) {
						heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and add:

					if (token.equals("character-reborn")) {
						reborn = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and at the beginning of client.java add this int:

public int reborn = 1;

Read full topic

@blindbandit wrote:

i am trying to make another donator point system called reborn points can anyone help me?

characterfile.write(Integer.toString(reborn), 0, Integer
.toString(reborn).length());
^

.toString(reborn).length());
